title: Hoshikawa Ginza Yonchoume
sinopse: This story lets us look into the relationship of Matsuda Otome (a home schooled girl) and Nakagawa Minato (an elementary school teacher). Otome has been through a difficult past and is now under the care of Minato-sensei. Otome becomes suspicious of Minato's day-to-day routines and investigates. What will Minato tell Otome when she confronts her?
